Title: Relates to extensions of order of protection
Summary: Allows family and criminal courts to extend orders of protection for up to two years beyond the expiration date of an issued order of protection if the court finds reason for an extension and places such reasoning on the record.
LawCode: Amd §154-c, Fam Ct Act; amd §§530.12 & 530.13, CP L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the family court act and the criminal procedure law, in relation to extensions of orders of protection
